name: Binary images
description: The interiors in Kalonica's Apartment (2021) are rendered in just two colours: white and blue. Like black and white film, this monochromatic art style was first employed due to technological constraints. Many contemporary filmmakers and videogame developers have revisited older techniques like these for artistic effect.

links.description: Developer Kalonica described Lucas Pope’s Return of the Obra Dinn (2018) as a formative influence on the art style of Apartment (2021). Both games focus on memory, using the simplistic line art & tones to create impressions of remembered spaces, rather than recreating them with perfect clarity.

He employed the same monochromatic 1-bit style, creating the appearance of texture and depth with visual noise.

end.title: The Testament of Dr. Mabuse
end.creator_credit: Fritz Lang, Hans Kothe, Conrad von Molo, Lothar Wolff, Seymour Nebenzal, Nero-Film AG and Thea von Harbou
end.brief_description: After a detective is assaulted by thugs and placed in an asylum run by Professor Baum, he observes the professor’s preoccupation with another patient, the criminal genius Dr. Mabuse the hypnotist. When Mabuse’s notes are found to be connected with a rash of recent crimes, Commissioner Lohmann must determine how Mabuse is communicating with the criminals, despite conflicting reports on the doctor’s whereabouts, and capture him for good.

links.description: The 1.19.1 aspect ratio The Lighthouse (2019) adopted was never in wide use, even in the 30s. One of the few examples is Fritz Lang’s The Testament of Dr Mabuse (1933), which similarly uses the aspect ratio to evoke a sense of claustrophobia and unease.
